title: Add some integration test case for DistSQL RAL

The second, third, fourth, fifth, tenth, and eleventh task of #20867.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
  - add test case for SHOW STATUS FROM READWRITE_SPLITTING RULES
  - add test case for SHOW AUTHORITY RULE
  - add test case for SHOW TRANSACTION RULE
  - add test case for SHOW SQL_PARSER RULE
  - add test case for SHOW DIST VARIABLES
  - add test case for SHOW SHOW DIST VARIABLE WHERE name = sql_show
